name: industrialdev/wicket-lib-org-roster
description: Organization & Roster management library for Wicket Inc.

production: [ -x vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer ] || composer install && composer cs:fix && rm -rf vendor && composer update --no-dev && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader
scripts.setup-hooks: mkdir -p .git/hooks && cp .ci/pre-push .git/hooks/pre-push && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-push && echo 'Git hooks installed to .git/hooks/pre-push'
scripts.test:browser: sh -lc 'if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; : "${WICKET_BROWSER_BASE_URL:=https://localhost}"; export WICKET_BROWSER_BASE_URL; ./vendor/bin/pest --testsuite browser'
